files_before.content:
[package]
name = "birchvault-desktop"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "BirchVault Desktop Application"
authors = ["BirchVault"]
edition = "2021"

[build-dependencies]
tauri-build = { version = "2.0", features = [] }

[dependencies]
# Tauri core and plugins
tauri = { version = "2.0", features = ["tray-icon"] }
tauri-plugin-shell = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-sql = { version = "2.0", features = ["sqlite"] }
tauri-plugin-autostart = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-clipboard-manager = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-notification = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-os = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-process = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-http = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-updater = "2.0"

# Serialization
serde = { version = "1.0", features = ["derive"] }
serde_json = "1.0"

# Database
rusqlite = { version = "0.31", features = ["bundled"] }

# Async runtime
tokio = { version = "1.0", features = ["full"] }

# Security - keyring for secure credential storage
keyring = "2.3"

# Time handling
chrono = { version = "0.4", features = ["serde"] }

# UUID generation
uuid = { version = "1.0", features = ["v4", "serde"] }

# HTTP client for sync
reqwest = { version = "0.12", features = ["json", "rustls-tls"] }

# Error handling
thiserror = "1.0"
anyhow = "1.0"

# Logging
log = "0.4"
env_logger = "0.11"

# Password hashing (for verifying master password locally)
argon2 = "0.5"

# Base64 encoding
base64 = "0.22"

[features]
default = ["custom-protocol"]
custom-protocol = ["tauri/custom-protocol"]

files_after.content:
[package]
name = "birchvault-desktop"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "BirchVault Desktop Application"
authors = ["BirchVault"]
edition = "2021"

[build-dependencies]
tauri-build = { version = "2.0", features = [] }

[dependencies]
# Tauri core and plugins
tauri = { version = "2.0", features = ["tray-icon"] }
tauri-plugin-shell = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-sql = { version = "2.0", features = ["sqlite"] }
tauri-plugin-autostart = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-clipboard-manager = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-notification = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-os = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-process = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-http = "2.0"
tauri-plugin-updater = "2.0"

# Serialization
serde = { version = "1.0", features = ["derive"] }
serde_json = "1.0"

# Database
rusqlite = { version = "0.31", features = ["bundled"] }

# Async runtime
tokio = { version = "1.0", features = ["full"] }

# Security - keyring for secure credential storage
keyring = "2.3"

# Time handling
chrono = { version = "0.4", features = ["serde"] }

# UUID generation
uuid = { version = "1.0", features = ["v4", "serde"] }

# HTTP client for sync
reqwest = { version = "0.12", features = ["json", "rustls-tls"] }

# Error handling
thiserror = "1.0"
anyhow = "1.0"

# Logging
log = "0.4"
env_logger = "0.11"

# Password hashing (for verifying master password locally)
argon2 = "0.5"

# Base64 encoding
base64 = "0.22"

[features]
default = ["custom-protocol"]
custom-protocol = ["tauri/custom-protocol"]
